timeline.message:
Update data-formats.md

Field error and light rewording of new Avro material (and working through the doc authoring process).

timeline.author: suneet-s
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -185,8 +185,8 @@ The ORC `inputFormat` has the following components:
 
 | Field | Type | Description | Required |
 |-------|------|-------------|----------|
-| type | String | This should say `json`. | yes |
-| flattenSpec | JSON Object | Specifies flattening configuration for nested JSON data. See [`flattenSpec`](#flattenspec) for more info. | no |
+| type | String | This should say `orc`. | yes |

timeline.bodyText: Since you're editing this file can you also fix the json on line 177 please - it's missing a comma after the }
timeline.author: suneet-s
